sentences.en: Bleach kills household germs.
sentences.cn: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

sentences.en: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.cn: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.en: He held her at knifepoint and threatened to kill her.
sentences.cn: 他用刀将她挟持并威胁说要杀了她。

sentences.en: He paid my brother to kill Norton and keep his mouth shut.
sentences.cn: 他花钱雇我兄弟去杀了诺顿并给了他封口费。

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: It is better to die oneself than to kill.
sentences.cn: 宁可自亡，不可行凶。

sentences.en: Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.cn: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.en: Pythons kill by tightening their coils so that their victim cannot breathe.
sentences.cn: 大蟒蛇紧紧盘绕猎物使之无法呼吸，从而杀死猎物。

sentences.en: Seeing his chance, Dennis moved in for the kill.
sentences.cn: 看到机会来了，丹尼斯开始采取行动。

sentences.en: Smoking kills.
sentences.cn: 吸烟会致人死亡。

sentences.en: The book analyses why women kill and how the law treats them.
sentences.cn: 该书分析了女性杀人的动机以及法律对此是如何规定的。

sentences.en: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.cn: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.en: the spring Budget will be kill or cure.
sentences.cn: 春季预算将会是孤注一掷的行为。

sentences.en: there is every possibility all river life would be killed off for generations.
sentences.cn: 非常有可能的是所有的河流生物会有好几代都被毁灭掉。

sentences.en: This is a torturous, agonizing way to kill someone.
sentences.cn: 这是一种让人受尽折磨、痛苦难忍的杀人方法。

sentences.en: This murderous lunatic could kill them both without a second thought.
sentences.cn: 这个杀人狂会不假思索地把他们两个都杀掉。

sentences.en: To kill the hours while she waited, Ann worked in the garden.
sentences.cn: 为了打发等待的那几个小时，安在菜园里干些活。

sentences.en: we are going to smile and be pleasant if it kills us.
sentences.cn: 无论如何我们都要微笑，都要高兴。

sentences.en: Whom would it profit to terrify or to kill James Sinclair?
sentences.cn: 恐吓或者干掉詹姆斯·辛克莱对谁会有好处？

sentences.en: Why did she kill her husband?
sentences.cn: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.en: Why would she cover for someone who was trying to kill her?
sentences.cn: 她为什么要包庇想要杀她的人呢？

sentences.en: With time to kill, he took a cab to the centre.
sentences.cn: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

sentences.en: Yesterday his kidnappers issued a second threat to kill him.
sentences.cn: 昨天绑匪再次威胁要将他撕票。

sentences.en: You shouldn't always have to kill yourself to do well.
sentences.cn: 你不该总是为了做到尽善尽美而累坏自己。

words.tran_cn: 杀害的；迷人的；使人筋疲力尽的
杀手；致死；止痛药；宰杀的器具；断路器

phrases.tran_cn: 企业成功交易时在场或受益

phrases.phrase: go (或 move in 或 close in) for the kill
in at the kill 或 in on the kill

phrases.tran_cn: 屠杀：摧毁大多数造成绝种
自杀；竭尽全力；尽最大努力
(英)（问题的补救）孤注一掷；非死即活；不成功便成仁

phrases.phrase: kill two birds with one stone

trans.tran_cn: 杀死，猎，被捕杀的动物，猎物
trans.tran_en: the act of killing a hunted animal
to make a person or animal die

trans.tran_cn: 使停止[结束，失败]，破坏，减弱，抵消，使痛苦，使受折磨，使笑得前仰后合，使笑死了
trans.tran_en: to make a person or animal die
